author: TheFadedTBCap
title: Best Video Game Yet
review:
This video game is awesome!  Best LEGO game yet!   This game has a great original story and having the minifigures talk is a stroke of genius.  This game is very humorous and is a whole lot of fun.

Pros:
Great story and the levels are really fun
Can explore Gotham City
Win Gold Bricks that lead to new characters and a secret level
Can replay levels to collect minikits like previous LEGO games
Fighting is better with grabs like the original Batman and special moves
Certain heroes can fly which works really well
Over 60 characters
Can make your own character
Can buy planes, cars, and boats
Gotham City has boat and aircraft races for gold bricks
Batman and Robin have cool new suits

Cons:
Build your own character has limited choices and abilities vary from each character
If playing the game with a friend, there is one level where Superman and Batman are chasing Lex Luthor's plane and a pilot is supposed to jump into a helijet, but sometimes he doesn't and you can't continue on with the level (to fix this, you have to play the level in single player until the pilot jumps in his jet)

Overall, this is an amazing video game.  I give it a 10/10 and I recommend it to anyone.
